thread.title: Mike Spintman

author: Mike Spintman
title: Mike Spintman
text: I used the free trial and received 60 applicants in the 4 days. I was able to hire one of them. Zip Recruiter billed me the $249 on the Sunday the 4th day. Since we were closed, I was unable to stop the pmt until Monday morning. I called and Les was willing and able to refund me the subscription charge. I will be happy to promote Zip Recruiter to anyone who is looking to post a job offer or looking for a job
